dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7807 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand eligibility for, and extend authorization of, certain programs for homeless veterans.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ruiz introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand eligibility for, and extend authorization of, certain programs for homeless veterans.

section.header: Health Care for Homeless Veterans program: expansion of eligibility; extension of authorization

subsection.text: Section 2002(b)(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting 2031, after 2013,.
Section 2031(b) of such title is amended by striking 2022 and inserting 2027.

section.header: Extension of authorization of program of additional services for homeless veterans
section.text: Section 2033(d) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking 2022 and inserting 2027.
